cfmongodb.components
Class ExpressionBuilder

railo-context.Component
        cfmongodb.components.ExpressionBuilder

public class ExpressionBuilder

extends railo-context.Component

Creates a Domain Specific Language (DSL) for querying MongoDB collections.

addArrayCriteria

public any addArrayCriteria([string element], [array val], [string type])
refactored $expressions for numerics

Parameters:
element - The array element in the document we're searching
val - The value(s) of an element in the array
type - $in,$nin,etc.

addNumericCriteria

public any addNumericCriteria([string element], [numeric val], [string type])
refactored $expressions for numerics

Parameters:
element - The element in the document we're searching
val - The comparative value of the element
type - $gt,$lt,etc. The operators - <><=>= ...
